body:
Day 38 - 909*
I won't even question why everyone fucks each other, after all, this new girl just decided that she wanted to have sex with the gorilla that goes to the same school as her. What I really gotta question is why the guy keeps eating a whole pig for breakfast, a cow for lunch and a sheep for dinner every single day, while not exercising at all, it really is a miracle how he can walk three steps before having a heart attack.
2/10.
